item.title: Joan Jett & The Blackhearts - I Love Rock'n Roll
item.description:
I saw him
dancin’ there
By the
record machine
I knew he must have
been about seventeen
It hit me so strong
Play my favorite song
And I could tell it
wouldn’t be long
Till he was
with me yeah me
And I could tell it
wouldn’t be long
Till he was with me
yeah me singin’
I love rock’n roll
So put another dime
In the
jukebox baby
I love rock’n roll
So come and take
Your time and
dance with me
He smiled
so I got up
And asked
for his name
That don’t matter
he said
‘Cause it’s
all the same
Said can I
take you home
Where we
can be alone
And next we
were movin’ on

yeah me
